resources:
Settings SplashScreen HamroPay
HamroPay is the fun new way to send and receive money. Nepal ma baneko. Start sending money SignUpActivity
Lets get you started. What is your name? Your Phone number What is your email address? (Optional) Continue Select a photo from the library or take a new photo from camera. HamroPay works great when you have friends and have a valid bank/credit card account connected. Add a credit or debit card Add a bank account Search for friends
Please enter the verification code. Skip this for now
Hello blank fragment You do not have a bank account from where you can send money from.\n \n Please add a bank account. Add a Bank Bank branch " cannot be empty" " name" Account " Number" " Holder" Search for a User Invite Invite a Friend Alternately, you could also SEND MONEY REQUEST MONEY SEND MESSAGE SEND INVITATION Enter a Phone Number Message Coming Soon * Standard SMS rate will apply\ Unable to load the database from assets SettingsActivity Make this user host Connectivity
Please select a bank Please select a branch
You requested a payment. There are no transaction \n right now You can initiate your first\ntransaction from here. Share a transaction with Make a payment to MAKE A PAYMENT Connect Bank * You are now making a secured connection to your online banking. We do not store or share your login information.
Place the code within the frame to scan users and \n initiate transaction.
